original_text: Hilkiah told Shaphan, the king's secretary, ‘I have found the book of the Law in the Lord's temple.’ He gave the book to Shaphan.
korean_text: 힐기야가 서기관 사반에게 말하여 이르되 내가 여호와의 전에서 율법책을 발견하였노라 하고 힐기야가 그 책을 사반에게 주매

sentences.original_text: Hilkiah told Shaphan, the king's secretary
'I have found the book of the Law'
He gave the book to Shaphan.
